name: Arrow-Toolkit
description:
Arrow-Toolkit

Entry for GMTK 2019

Theme: Only ONE

  • You have Only ONE arrow.
  • Playing in only one screen
  • Enemies and you have only 1 hp (Cherish it!)
  • Of course you have only one live
  • How long can you chain your combo while staying alive?

（AB testing) This version punishes  piercing zombies, and does not reward bouncing at walls

Control
  • WASD to move
  • Hold L-Click to charge, release to shoot
  • L to view credits
